SNOW_SOURCES_acc: snow sources (liquid water) accumulator number of samples
SOILICE_acc: soil ice (vegetated landunits only) accumulator number of samples
SOILICE_ICE_acc: soil ice (ice landunits only) accumulator number of samples
SOILLIQ_acc: soil liquid water (vegetated landunits only) accumulator number of samples
SOILLIQ_ICE_acc: soil liquid water (ice landunits only) accumulator number of samples
SOILWATER_10CM_acc: soil liquid water + ice in top 10cm of soil (veg landunits only) accumulator number of samples
SUPPLY_acc: runoff supply for land use accumulator number of samples
SoilAlpha_acc: factor limiting ground evap accumulator number of samples
SoilAlpha_U_acc: urban factor limiting ground evap accumulator number of samples
TAUX_acc: zonal surface stress accumulator number of samples
TAUY_acc: meridional surface stress accumulator number of samples
TBOT_acc: atmospheric air temperature accumulator number of samples
TBUILD_acc: internal urban building temperature accumulator number of samples
TG_acc: ground temperature accumulator number of samples
TG_R_acc: Rural ground temperature accumulator number of samples
TG_U_acc: Urban ground temperature accumulator number of samples
TH2OSFC_acc: surface water temperature accumulator number of samples
THBOT_acc: atmospheric air potential temperature accumulator number of samples
TKE1_acc: top lake level eddy thermal conductivity accumulator number of samples
TLAI_acc: total projected leaf area index accumulator number of samples
TLAKE_acc: lake temperature accumulator number of samples
TREFMNAV_acc: daily minimum of average 2-m temperature accumulator number of samples
TREFMNAV_R_acc: Rural daily minimum of average 2-m temperature accumulator number of samples
TREFMNAV_U_acc: Urban daily minimum of average 2-m temperature accumulator number of samples
TREFMXAV_acc: daily maximum of average 2-m temperature accumulator number of samples
TREFMXAV_R_acc: Rural daily maximum of average 2-m temperature accumulator number of samples
TREFMXAV_U_acc: Urban daily maximum of average 2-m temperature accumulator number of samples
TSA_acc: 2m air temperature accumulator number of samples
TSAI_acc: total projected stem area index accumulator number of samples
TSA_R_acc: Rural 2m air temperature accumulator number of samples
TSA_U_acc: Urban 2m air temperature accumulator number of samples
TSOI_acc: soil temperature (vegetated landunits only) accumulator number of samples
TSOI_10CM_acc: soil temperature in top 10cm of soil accumulator number of samples
TSOI_ICE_acc: soil temperature (ice landunits only) accumulator number of samples
TV_acc: vegetation temperature accumulator number of samples
TWS_acc: total water storage accumulator number of samples
TWS_MONTH_BEGIN_acc: total water storage at the beginning of a month accumulator number of samples
TWS_MONTH_END_acc: total water storage at the end of a month accumulator number of samples
U10WITHGUSTS_acc: 10-m wind with gustiness enhancement included accumulator number of samples
URBAN_AC_acc: urban air conditioning flux accumulator number of samples
URBAN_HEAT_acc: urban heating flux accumulator number of samples
VOLR_acc: river channel total water storage accumulator number of samples
VOLRMCH_acc: river channel main channel water storage accumulator number of samples
WA_acc: water in the unconfined aquifer (vegetated landunits only) accumulator number of samples
WASTEHEAT_acc: sensible heat flux from heating/cooling sources of urban waste h accumulator number of samples
WIND_acc: atmospheric wind velocity magnitude accumulator number of samples
ZBOT_acc: atmospheric reference height accumulator number of samples
ZWT_acc: water table depth (vegetated landunits only) accumulator number of samples
ZWT_PERCH_acc: perched water table depth (vegetated landunits only) accumulator number of samples
dov2xy: Output on 2D grid format (TRUE) or vector format (FALSE)
ntimes: Number of time steps on file
name: Fieldnames
BSW: slope of soil water retention curve
